column3: The modern mistake is to think that important things must be planned, sponsored, reviewed, or licensed by the government.

column3: Further, as we reported in April 2001, the National Infrastructure Protection Center had mixed success in establishing information-sharing relationships with other government entities and private industry.
column4: The National Infrastructure Protection Center didn't have the anticipated success in establishing good information-sharing relationships with other government entities.
